message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  What do you think?
I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $11,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go to $10,500. This is the absolute most I can do.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,750, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is the lowest I can go and still make a profit. What do you think?
